channel.title: DW on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in DW on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian Lives (The Russians & Living in Russia)
item.description: The Russians 2 x For the German broadcaster DW, Juri Rescheto ( Twitter, profile) traveled through Russia to create the documentary described above. The lives of ordinary Russians, in two parts, titled The Russians – an intimate journey through Russia (2020, 2 x 42 m).

item.title: Smiling is for fools
item.description: Three times about the Russian (non-)smile – more below the videos. Why Russians Don’t Smile (2017) Why Russians are being taught to smile (2018) See also Russians take a smiling course for the World Cup (NOS Jeugdjournaal, 2018, 3 m) and This is how Russians learn to smile for the WorldCup (Jimmy Kimmel, 2018).
